__e: But when you put 12 Americans together on a jury and you ask for justice... something just south of brilliance happens.
This kid wouldn't stand a chance with another jury, and you know it.

And when the truth comes out, any jury in their right mind will understand.
There isn't a jury in the world that would convict us.

Before a jury of those who hate me the most?
